story_23_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Having a dream is fine, but that’s no reason to
go forcing people to do things.
story_23_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Y-you’re right. I’m sorry. We just got a bit
too excited...
story_23_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hey, you. You said you know Elesa?
story_23_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: Huh? Of course. I just saw her not too long ago.
story_23_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: Really? Could you tell me where you saw her?
story_23_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I’ve heard that Elesa is on Pasio, and I’ve
actually been wanting to meet her.
story_23_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: R-really? I can draw you a map right now!
story_23_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I’m certain that one of your dresses would really
complement Elesa’s beauty! Please make one
for her!
story_23_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I see now. The person you said you wanted to
meet was Elesa.
story_23_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I’ve been wanting to meet her for a while now.
She’s really stylish.
story_23_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I want to know how she thinks and lives—
and how to become like that.
story_23_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I feel like meeting her would really get my
creativity going.
story_23_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I don’t really get what’s happening, but you want
to meet Elesa, right?
story_23_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I’ll show you to where the map leads.
Please follow closely.
